department.en: Department of Space Science and Engineering

goal.en: “This class aims to start with basic MHD equations, and teach students how the equations can be applied to explain/describe different features and phenomena on the Sun.“
goal.ch: 本課程的目的，從基本的磁流體力學方程組開始，教導學生如何用方程解釋/描述太陽不同的現象

content.en:
“The class will cover the following topics and their application on solar features/phenomena
- Magnetohydrodynamics
- Magnetic forces
- Magnetohydrostatic equilibria
- Waves
In addition to the lecture, students will be asked to do a midterm report/project. The topic will be announced in the class.
All interested students who have taken general physics and
electromagnetics classes are welcome.“
content.ch:
課程將含下列主題：
- 磁流體力學
- 磁力
- 磁流體靜力學
- 不同 之 波動
